title: Got a ton of skins, they're not showing as unlocked
body:
I haven't played in awhile, and I just got six or so skins from the mission, I guess turning all my runes and pages into rewards?

One of them was Star Guardian Lux, and a bunch others, but it's not showing as unlocked? I re-logged, nothing happened.  A bug? Does it take awhile for them to unlock?

replies.body: I'm going to save you a lot of time in the future. Go to the store and go to account/purchase history. Every item you obtain, from missions/chests appear there too. Meaning any reward your unsure of you can double check there.
Looks like it was actually Star Guardian Miss Fortune you got, not Lux. Were you able to find that one?
